Date: Thursday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of James More
Dear Sir,
James More isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Bastien Deans!
He has an AVG of .162, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
